text: Indian shares inched higher on Wednesday, snapping a two-day losing streak, as investors held back big bets ahead of the Union Budget presentation at 11:00am.The S&P BSE Sensex climbed 0.1 percent to 27,695 while the NSE Nifty gained 0.2 percent to 8,578. The market breadth was skewed in favour of the buyers. About 893 stocks advanced, 543 advanced and 449 remained unchanged.
title: Stocks Radar: ICICI Bank, ONGC, InterGlobe Aviation And More
